item.name: Armani Jeans Crew Neck Gradient T Shirt White
item.detail: Armani Jeans Crew Neck Gradient T Shirt In White, A classic t shirt with a ribbed crew neckline and short sleeves. An overall dip dye effect gradient design in white and navy.
item.size: The model (height 5'8" and chest 33") is wearing a size S
item.info: Define style this season with Armani's new range of trendy tops, crafted with intricate details. Create a chic statement look by teaming this lace number with skinny jeans and pumps.
